[03] thero brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo neva vuddhe jānāti na dahare, ācikkhissāmissa vuddhe ca dahare cā''ti desanaṃ vaḍḍhento ^b^atthi brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^jānatā^eb^ti sabbaṃ neyyaṃ jānantena. ^b^passatā^eb^ti tadeva hatthe ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya passantena. ^b^vuddhabhūmī^eb^ti yena kāraṇena vuddho nāma hoti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^daharabhūmī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0141^ea^ yena kāraṇena daharo nāma hoti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^āsītiko^eb^ti asītivassavayo. ^b^nāvutiko^eb^ti navutivassavayo. ^b^kāme paribhuñjatī^eb^ti vatthukāme kilesakāmeti duvidhepi kāme kamanavasena paribhuñjati. ^b^kāmamajjhāvasatī^eb^ti duvidhepi kāme ghare gharassāmiko viya vasati adhivasati. ^b^kāmapariyesanāya ussuko^eb^ti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ pariyesanatthaṃ ussukkamāpanno. ^b^bālo na therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti so na thero bālo mandotveva gaṇanaṃ gacchati. vuttaṃ hetaṃ --
[21] ``na ^a^M2.0044^ea^ tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṃ siro.
[22] paripakko vayo tassa, moghajiṇṇoti vuccatī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 260).

[03] ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^yuvā^eb^ti yobbanena samannāgato. ^b^susukāḷakeso^eb^ti suṭṭhu kāḷakeso. ^b^bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato^eb^ti yena yobbanena samannāgato yuvā, taṃ yobbanaṃ bhadraṃ laddhakanti dasseti. ^b^paṭhamena vayasā^eb^ti paṭhamavayo nāma tettiṃsa vassāni, tena samannāgatoti attho. ^b^paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti so evarūpo puggalo paṇḍitoti ca theroti ca gaṇanaṃ gacchati. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo.
[22] sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 261).

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^P2.0142^ea^ ^b^corā balavanto hontī^eb^ti pakkhasampannā, parivārasampannā, dhanasampannā, nivāsaṭṭhānasampannā, vāhanasampannā ca honti. ^b^rājāno tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontī^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye rājāno tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti. ^b^atiyātu^eb^nti bahiddhā janapadacārikaṃ ^a^V2.0043^ea^ caritvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ. ^b^niyyātu^eb^nti ``corā janapadaṃ vilumpanti maddanti, te nisedhessāmā''ti paṭhamayāme vā majjhimayāme vā pacchimayāme vā nikkhamituṃ phāsukaṃ na hoti. tato uṭṭhāya corā manusse pothetvā acchinditvā gacchanti. ^b^paccantime vā janapade anusaññātu^eb^nti gāmaṃ vāsakaraṇatthāya setuṃ attharaṇatthāya pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpanatthāya sālādīnaṃ karaṇatthāya paccantime janapade anusaññātumpi na sukhaṃ hoti. ^b^brāhmaṇagahapatikāna^eb^nti antonagaravāsīnaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ. ^b^bāhirāni vā kammantānī^eb^ti bahigāme ārāme khettakammantāni. ^b^pāpabhikkhū balavanto hontī^eb^ti pakkhuttarā yasuttarā puññavanto bahukehi upaṭṭhākehi ca upaṭṭhākīhi ca samannāgatā rājarājamahāmattasannissitā. ^b^pesalā bhikkhū tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontī^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye piyasīlā bhikkhū tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti. ^b^tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtāva saṅghamajjhe saṅkasāyantī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0045^ea^ nissaddā hutvā saṅghamajjhe nisinnā kiñci ekavacanampi mukhaṃ ukkhipitvā kathetuṃ asakkontā pajjhāyantā viya nisīdanti. ^b^tayida^eb^nti ^a^P2.0143^ea^ tadetaṃ kāraṇaṃ. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetū^eb^ti micchāpaṭipattiyā kāraṇahetu paṭipajjanahetūti attho. ^b^ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusala^eb^nti sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ. evarūpo hi sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ ārādhetuṃ sampādetuṃ pūretuṃ na sakkoti. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo. imasmiṃ sutte saha vipassanāya maggo kathito.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^duggahitehī^eb^ti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitehi. ^b^byañjanappatirūpakehī^eb^ti byañjanaso patirūpakehi akkharacitratāya laddhakehi. ^b^atthañca dhammañca paṭibāhantī^eb^ti suggahitasuttantānaṃ atthañca pāḷiñca paṭibāhanti, attano duggahitasuttantānaṃyeva atthañca pāḷiñca uttaritaraṃ katvā dassenti. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo. imasmiṃ sutte sāsanassa vuddhi ca parihāni ca kathitāti.
[06] samacittavaggo catuttho.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0044^ea^ paṭhame ^b^uttānā^eb^ti pākaṭā appaṭicchannā. ^b^gambhīrā^eb^ti guḷhā paṭicchannā. ^b^uddhatā^eb^ti uddhaccena samannāgatā. ^b^unnaḷā^eb^ti uggatanaḷā, uṭṭhitatucchamānāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^capalā^eb^ti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā cāpallena yuttā. ^b^mukharā^eb^ti mukhakharā kharavacanā. ^b^vikiṇṇavācā^eb^ti asaṃyatavacanā divasampi niratthakavacanapalāpino. ^b^muṭṭhassatī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0144^ea^ vissaṭṭhasatino. ^b^asampajānā^eb^ti nippaññā. ^b^asamāhitā^eb^ti cittekaggatāmattassāpi alābhino. ^b^pākatindriyā^eb^ti pakatiyā ṭhitehi vivaṭehi arakkhitehi indriyehi samannāgatā. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0046^ea^ ^b^bhaṇḍanajātā^eb^ti bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgo, taṃ tesaṃ jātanti bhaṇḍanajātā. tathā ``mayaṃ tumhe daṇḍāpessāma bandhāpessāmā''tiādivacanappavattiyā sañjātakalahā. ayaṃ tāva gihīsu nayo. pabbajitā pana āpattivītikkamavācaṃ vadantā ^b^kalahajātā^eb^ nāma. ^b^vivādāpannā^eb^ti viruddhavādaṃ āpannā. ^b^mukhasattīhi vitudantā^eb^ti guṇānaṃ chindanaṭṭhena dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccanti, tāhi vitudantā vijjhantā. ^b^samaggā^eb^ti ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti etesaṃ karaṇena samaggatāya sahitā. ^b^piyacakkhūhī^eb^ti mettācakkhūhi.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^aggavatī^eb^ti uttamapuggalavatī, aggāya vā uttamāya paṭipattiyā samannāgatā. tato viparītā ^b^anaggavatī. bāhulikā^eb^ti cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā. sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ gaṇhantīti ^b^sāthalikā. okkamane pubbaṅgamā^eb^ti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni, tena pañcanīvaraṇapūraṇe pubbaṅgamāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^paviveke^eb^ti upadhiviveke nibbāne. ^b^nikkhittadhurā^eb^ti tividhepi viveke oropitadhurā. ^b^na vīriyaṃ ārabhantī^eb^ti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ na karonti. ^b^appattassa pattiyā^eb^ti pubbe appattassa jhānavipassanāmaggaphalavisesassa pattiatthāya. itaraṃ ^a^P2.0145^ea^ padadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^pacchimā janatā^eb^ti saddhivihārikāntevāsikajano ^a^V2.0045^ea^. ^b^diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti ācariyupajjhāyehi kataṃ anukaronto diṭṭhassa tesaṃ ācārassa anugatiṃ āpajjati nāma. sesaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṃ.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^ariyā^eb^ti ariyasāvakaparisā. ^b^anariyā^eb^ti puthujjanaparisā. ^b^``idaṃ dukkha''nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma, ettakameva dukkhaṃ, ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ natthīti yathāsabhāvato nappajānanti. esa nayo sabbattha. sesapadesu pana tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā ^b^samudayo^eb^ nāma, tassāyeva taṇhāya, dvinnampi vā tesaṃ saccānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppatti ^b^dukkhanirodho^eb^ nāma, aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo ^b^dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā^eb^ nāmāti ^a^M2.0047^ea^ evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā ca cattāri ca phalāni kathitāni.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^parisākasaṭo^eb^ti kasaṭaparisā kacavaraparisā palāpaparisāti attho. ^b^parisāmaṇḍo^eb^ti pasannaparisā sāraparisāti attho. ^b^chandāgatiṃ gacchantī^eb^ti chandena agatiṃ gacchanti, akattabbaṃ karontīti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. imāni pana cattāri agatigamanāni bhaṇḍabhājanīye ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne ca labbhanti. tattha bhaṇḍabhājanīye tāva attano bhārabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ amanāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento ^b^chandāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. attano pana abhārabhūtānaṃ manāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā amanāpaṃ dento ^b^dosāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. bhaṇḍakabhājanīyavatthuñca ṭhitikañca ajānanto ^b^mohāgatiṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0146^ea^ ^b^gacchati^eb^ nāma. mukharānaṃ vā rājādinissitānaṃ vā ``ime me amanāpe bhaṇḍake dinne anatthampi kareyyu''nti bhayena parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento ^b^bhayāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. yo pana evaṃ na gacchati, sabbesaṃ tulābhūto pamāṇabhūto majjhatto hutvā yaṃ yassa pāpuṇāti, taññeva tassa deti, ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma. vinicchayaṭṭhāne pana attano bhārabhūtassa garukāpattiṃ lahukāpattīti katvā kathento ^b^chandāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. itarassa lahukāpattiṃ garukāpattīti katvā kathento ^b^dosāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ pana samuccayakkhandhakañca ajānanto ^b^mohāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. mukharassa vā rājapūjitassa vā ``ayaṃ me garukaṃ katvā āpattiṃ kathentassa anatthampi kareyyā''ti garukameva lahukāti katvā kathento ^b^bhayāgatiṃ gacchati^eb^ nāma. yo pana sabbesaṃ yathābhūtameva katheti, ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0046^ea^ ^b^okkācitavinītā^eb^ti dubbinītā. ^b^no paṭipucchāvinītā^eb^ti na pucchitvā vinītā. ^b^gambhīrā^eb^ti pāḷivasena gambhīrā sallasuttasadisā. ^b^gambhīratthā^eb^ti atthavasena gambhīrā mahāvedallasuttasadisā. ^b^lokuttarā^eb^ti lokuttarātthadīpakā ^a^M2.0048^ea^. ^b^suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttā^eb^ti sattasuññaṃ dhammamattameva pakāsakā asaṅkhatasaṃyuttasadisā. ^b^na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentī^eb^ti vijānanatthāya cittaṃ na upaṭṭhapenti, niddāyanti vā aññavihitā vā honti. ^b^uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabba^eb^nti uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe ca. ^b^kavitā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0147^ea^ kavīhi katā. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^cittakkharā^eb^ti vicitrākkharā. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^bāhirakā^eb^ti sāsanato bahibhūtā. ^b^sāvakabhāsitā^eb^ti tesaṃ tesaṃ sāvakehi bhāsitā. ^b^sussūsantī^eb^ti akkharacittatāya ceva sarasampattiyā ca attamanā hutvā suṇanti. ^b^na ceva aññamaññaṃ paṭipucchantī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ atthaṃ vā anusandhiṃ vā pubbāparaṃ vā na pucchanti. ^b^na ca paṭivicarantī^eb^ti pucchanatthāya cārikaṃ na vicaranti. ^b^idaṃ katha^eb^nti idaṃ byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabbaṃ kinti ropetabbaṃ? ^b^imassa ko attho^eb^ti imassa bhāsitassa ko attho, kā anusandhi, kiṃ pubbāparaṃ? ^b^avivaṭa^eb^nti paṭicchannaṃ. ^b^na vivarantī^eb^ti na ugghāṭenti. ^b^anuttānīkata^eb^nti apākaṭaṃ kataṃ. ^b^na uttāniṃ karontī^eb^ti pākaṭaṃ na karonti. ^b^kaṅkhāṭhāniyesū^eb^ti kaṅkhāya kāraṇabhūtesu. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^āmisagarū^eb^ti catupaccayagarukā lokuttaradhammaṃ lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā. ^b^saddhammagarū^eb^ti nava lokuttaradhamme garuke katvā cattāro paccaye lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā. ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^ti dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto. ^b^paññāvimutto^eb^ti paññāya vimutto sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo. ^b^kāyasakkhī^eb^ti kāyena jhānaphassaṃ phusitvā pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā ṭhito. ^b^diṭṭhippatto^eb^ti ^a^P2.0148^ea^ diṭṭhantaṃ patto. ime dvepi chasu ṭhānesu labbhanti. ^b^saddhāvimutto^eb^ti saddahanto vimutto. ayampi chasu ṭhānesu labbhati. dhammaṃ anussaratīti ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^. saddhaṃ anussaratīti^b^ saddhānusārī^eb^. ime dvepi paṭhamamaggasamaṅgino. ^b^kalyāṇadhammo^eb^ti sundaradhammo. ^b^dussīlo pāpadhammo^eb^ti nissīlo lāmakadhammo. imaṃ kasmā gaṇhanti? sabbesu hi ekasadisesu jātesu ^a^M2.0049^ea^ sīlavantesu balavagāravaṃ na hoti, ekaccesu pana dussīlesu sati sīlavantānaṃ upari balavagāravaṃ hotīti maññantā gaṇhanti. ^b^te tena lābhaṃ labhantī^eb^ti te bhikkhū ekaccānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ ekaccānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā cattāro paccaye labhanti. ^b^gathitā^eb^ti taṇhāya ganthitā. ^b^mucchitā^eb^ti taṇhāvaseneva mucchitā. ^b^ajjhopannā^eb^ti ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ^a^V2.0047^ea^ ṭhitā. ^b^anādīnavadassāvino^eb^ti apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ādīnavaṃ apassantā. ^b^anissaraṇapaññā^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu chandarāgāpakaḍḍhanāya nissaraṇapaññāya virahitā idamatthaṃ etanti ajānantā. ^b^paribhuñjantī^eb^ti sacchandarāgā hutvā paribhuñjanti.

[03] sukkapakkhe ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ sattannampi ariyapuggalānaṃ saṅkhepapakāsanā -- eko bhikkhu paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭho aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. so tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhi nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma. samāpattīhi vikkhambhanavimuttiyā maggena samucchedavimuttiyāti dvikkhattuṃ vā dvīhi vā bhāgehi vimuttoti attho. aparo paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭho samāpattiyo nibbattetuṃ ^a^P2.0149^ea^ asakkonto sukkhavipassakova hutvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. so tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimutto nāma. aparo saddhādhurena abhiniviṭṭho aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. so tasmiṃ khaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhi nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma. aparo saddhādhurena abhiniviṭṭho samāpattiyo nibbattetuṃ asakkonto sukkhavipassakova hutvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. so tasmiṃ khaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimutto nāma.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^visamā^eb^ti sapakkhalanaṭṭhena visamā. ^b^samā^eb^ti nipakkhalanaṭṭhena samā. ^b^adhammakammānī^eb^ti uddhammāni kammāni. ^b^avinayakammānī^eb^ti ubbinayāni kammāni.
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M2.0050^ea^ ^b^adhammikā^eb^ti niddhammā. ^b^dhammikā^eb^ti dhammayuttā.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^adhikaraṇa^eb^nti vivādādhikaraṇādicatubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ. ^b^ādiyantī^eb^ti gaṇhanti. ^b^saññāpentī^eb^ti jānāpenti. ^b^na ca saññattiṃ upagacchantī^eb^ti saññāpanatthaṃ na sannipatanti. ^b^na ca nijjhāpentī^eb^ti na pekkhāpenti. ^b^na ca nijjhattiṃ upagacchantī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ nijjhāpanatthāya na sannipatanti. ^b^asaññattibalā^eb^ti asaññattiyeva balaṃ etesanti asaññattibalā ^a^V2.0048^ea^. ^b^appaṭinissaggamantino^eb^ti yesaṃ hi evaṃ hoti -- ``sace amhehi gahitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhissāma. sace adhammikaṃ, vissajjessāmā''ti, te paṭinissaggamantino nāma ^a^P2.0150^ea^ honti. ime pana na tathā mantentīti appaṭinissaggamantino. ^b^thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissā^eb^ti diṭṭhithāmena ca diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca abhinivisitvā. ^b^idameva sacca^eb^nti idaṃ amhākaṃ vacanameva saccaṃ. ^b^moghamañña^eb^nti avasesānaṃ vacanaṃ moghaṃ tucchaṃ. sukkapakkho uttānatthoyevāti.
[06] parisavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ dutiyapaṇṇāsakassa ^a^V2.0049^ea^ ^a^M2.0051^ea^ paṭhame cakkavattinā saddhiṃ gahitattā ``lokānukampāyā''ti na vuttaṃ. ettha ca cakkavattino uppattiyā dve sampattiyo labhanti, buddhānaṃ uppattiyā tissopi.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^acchariyamanussā^eb^ti āciṇṇamanussā abbhutamanussā.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^bahuno janassa anutappā hotī^eb^ti mahājanassa anutāpakārī hoti. tattha cakkavattino kālakiriyā ekacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ anutāpaṃ karoti, tathāgatassa kālakiriyā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^thūpārahā^eb^ti thūpassa yuttā anucchavikā. cakkavattino hi cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā dve sampattiyo labhanti, buddhānaṃ cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā tissopi.
[03] 57^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^buddhā^eb^ti attano ānubhāvena cattāri saccāni buddhā.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^phalantiyā^eb^ti saddaṃ karontiyā. ^b^na santasantī^eb^ti na bhāyanti. tattha khīṇāsavo attano sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā na bhāyati, hatthājānīyo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattāti. sattamaṭṭhamesupi ^a^P2.0151^ea^ eseva nayo.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^kiṃpurisā^eb^ti kinnarā. ^b^mānusiṃ vācaṃ na bhāsantī^eb^ti manussakathaṃ na kathenti. dhammāsokassa kira ekaṃ kinnaraṃ ānetvā dassesuṃ. so ``kathāpetha na''nti āha. kinnaro kathetuṃ ^a^V2.0050^ea^ na icchati. eko puriso ``ahametaṃ kathāpessāmī''ti heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otāretvā dve khāṇuke koṭṭetvā ukkhaliṃ āropesi. sā ubhatopassehi patati. taṃ disvā kinnaro ``kiṃ aññaṃ ekaṃ khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetuṃ ^a^M2.0052^ea^ na vaṭṭatī''ti ettakameva āha. puna aparabhāge dve kinnare ānetvā dassesuṃ. rājā ``kathāpetha ne''ti āha. te kathetuṃ na icchiṃsu. eko puriso ``ahamete kathāpessāmī''ti te gahetvā antarāpaṇaṃ agamāsi. tattheko ambapakkañca macche ca addasa, eko kabiṭṭhaphalañca ambilikāphalañca. tattha purimo ``mahāvisaṃ manussā khādanti, kathaṃ te kilāsino na hontī''ti āha. itaro ``kathaṃ ime etaṃ nissāya kuṭṭhino na hontī''ti āha. evaṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ kathetuṃ sakkontāpi dve atthe sampassamānā na kathentīti.
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^appaṭivāno^eb^ti anukaṇṭhito apaccosakkito.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^asantasannivāsa^eb^nti asappurisānaṃ sannivāsaṃ. ^b^na vadeyyā^eb^ti ovādena vā anusāsaniyā vā na vadeyya, mā vadatūti attho. ^b^therampāhaṃ na vadeyya^eb^nti ahampi theraṃ bhikkhuṃ ovādānusāsanivasena na vadeyyaṃ. ^b^ahitānukampī^eb^ti ahitaṃ icchamāno. ^b^no hitānukampī^eb^ti hitaṃ anicchamāno. ^b^noti naṃ vadeyya^eb^nti ``ahaṃ tava vacanaṃ na karissa''nti naṃ vadeyyaṃ. ^b^viheṭheyya^eb^nti vacanassa akaraṇena viheṭheyyaṃ. ^b^passampissa^eb^ ^a^P2.0152^ea^ ^b^nappaṭikareyya^eb^nti passantopi jānantopi ahaṃ tassa vacanaṃ na kareyyaṃ. iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. sukkapakkhe pana ^b^sādhūti naṃ vadeyya^eb^nti ``sādhu bhaddakaṃ sukathitaṃ tayā''ti tassa kathaṃ abhinandanto naṃ vadeyyanti attho.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^b^ubhato vacīsaṃsāro^eb^ti dvīsupi pakkhesu aññamaññaṃ akkosanapaccakkosanavasena saṃsaramānā vācā vacīsaṃsāro. ^b^diṭṭhipaḷāso^eb^ti diṭṭhiṃ nissāya uppajjanako yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso diṭṭhipaḷāso nāma. ^b^cetaso āghāto^eb^ti kopo. so hi cittaṃ āghātento uppajjati. ^b^appaccayo^eb^ti atuṭṭhākāro, domanassanti attho. ^b^anabhiraddhī^eb^ti kopoyeva. so hi anabhirādhanavasena anabhiraddhīti vuccati. ^b^ajjhattaṃ avūpasantaṃ hotī^eb^ti sabbampetaṃ niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte ^a^M2.0053^ea^ attano citte ca saddhivihārikāntevāsikasaṅkhātāya ^a^V2.0051^ea^ attano parisāya ca avūpasantaṃ hoti. ^b^tasmeta^eb^nti tasmiṃ etaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06] puggalavaggo paṭhamo.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0052^ea^ paṭhame ^b^gihisukha^eb^nti gihīnaṃ sabbakāmanipphattimūlakaṃ sukhaṃ. ^b^pabbajitasukha^eb^nti pabbajitānaṃ pabbajjāmūlakaṃ sukhaṃ.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^kāmasukha^eb^nti kāme ārabbha uppajjanakasukhaṃ. ^b^nekkhammasukha^eb^nti nekkhammaṃ vuccati pabbajjā, taṃ ārabbha uppajjanakasukhaṃ.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^P2.0153^ea^ ^b^upadhisukha^eb^nti tebhūmakasukhaṃ. ^b^nirupadhisukha^eb^nti lokuttarasukhaṃ.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^sāsavasukha^eb^nti āsavānaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ vaṭṭasukhaṃ. ^b^anāsavasukha^eb^nti tesaṃ apaccayabhūtaṃ vivaṭṭasukhaṃ.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^sāmisa^eb^nti saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭagāmisukhaṃ. ^b^nirāmisa^eb^nti nikkilesaṃ vivaṭṭagāmisukhaṃ.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^ariyasukha^eb^nti aputhujjanasukhaṃ. ^b^anariyasukha^eb^nti puthujjanasukhaṃ.
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^kāyika^eb^nti kāyaviññāṇasahajātaṃ. ^b^cetasika^eb^nti manodvārikasukhaṃ. taṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^sappītika^eb^nti paṭhamadutiyajjhānasukhaṃ. ^b^nippītika^eb^nti tatiyacatutthajjhānasukhaṃ. tattha lokiyasappītikato lokiyanippītikaṃ, lokuttarasappītikato ca lokuttaranippītikaṃ agganti evaṃ bhummantaraṃ abhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M2.0054^ea^ ^b^sātasukha^eb^nti tīsu jhānesu sukhaṃ. ^b^upekkhāsukha^eb^nti catutthajjhānasukhaṃ.
[03] 74^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V2.0053^ea^ ^b^samādhisukha^eb^nti appanaṃ vā upacāraṃ vā pattasukhaṃ. ^b^asamādhisukha^eb^nti tadubhayaṃ appattasukhaṃ.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^sappītikārammaṇa^eb^nti sappītikaṃ jhānadvayaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasukhaṃ. ^b^nippītikārammaṇe^eb^pi eseva nayo. dvādasamepi imināva upāyena attho veditabbo.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ terasame ^b^rūpārammaṇa^eb^nti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānārammaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakaṃ vā. ^b^arūpārammaṇa^eb^nti arūpāvacarajjhānārammaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci arūpaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakaṃ vāti.
[06] sukhavaggo dutiyo.
[03] 78-79^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0054^ea^ ^a^P2.0154^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sanimittā^eb^ti sakāraṇā. dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. nidānaṃ hetu saṅkhāro paccayo rūpanti sabbānipi hi etāni kāraṇavevacanāneva.
[03] 84^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^savedanā^eb^ti paccayabhūtāya sampayuttavedanāya satiyeva uppajjanti, nāsatīti attho. aṭṭhamanavamesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^saṅkhatārammaṇā^eb^ti paccayanibbattaṃ saṅkhatadhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāva uppajjanti. ^b^no asaṅkhatārammaṇā^eb^ti asaṅkhataṃ pana nibbānaṃ ārabbha na uppajjanti. ^b^na hontī^eb^ti maggakkhaṇe na honti nāma, phale patte nāhesunti. evametesu dasasupi ṭhānesu yāva arahattā desanā desitāti.
[06] sanimittavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 88^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0055^ea^ ^a^M2.0055^ea^ paṭhame ^b^cetovimuttī^eb^ti phalasamādhi. ^b^paññāvimuttī^eb^ti phalapaññā.
[03] 89^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^paggāho^eb^ti vīriyaṃ. ^b^avikkhepo^eb^ti cittekaggatā.
[03] 90^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^nāma^eb^nti cattāro arūpakkhandhā. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti rūpakkhandho. iti imasmiṃ sutte dhammakoṭṭhāsaparicchedañāṇaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
[03] 91^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^vijjā^eb^ti phalañāṇaṃ. ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti taṃsampayuttā sesadhammā.
[03] 92^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^bhavadiṭṭhī^eb^ti sassatadiṭṭhi. ^b^vibhavadiṭṭhī^eb^ti ucchedadiṭṭhi. chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
[03] 95^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^dovacassatā^eb^ti dubbacabhāvo. ^b^pāpamittatā^eb^ti pāpamittasevanabhāvo. navamaṃ ^a^P2.0155^ea^ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
[03] 97^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^dhātukusalatā^eb^ti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dhātūti jānanaṃ. ^b^manasikārakusalatā^eb^ti tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ aniccādivasena lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā jānanaṃ.
[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^āpattikusalatā^eb^ti pañcannañca sattannañca āpattikkhandhānaṃ jānanaṃ. ^b^āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā^eb^ti desanāya vā kammavācāya vā āpattīhi vuṭṭhānajānananti.
[06] dhammavaggo catuttho.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0056^ea^ paṭhame ^b^anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatī^eb^ti ``sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca, chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo, pātimokkhaṃ therabhāroti vuccatī''ti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ therabhāraṃ navako hutvā ^a^M2.0056^ea^ therena anajjhiṭṭho karonto anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāma. ^b^āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahatī^eb^ti thero samāno tameva dasavidhaṃ bhāraṃ attanā vā akaronto paraṃ vā asamādapento āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati nāma. dutiyasuttepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^akappiye kappiyasaññī^eb^ti akappiye sīhamaṃsādimhi ``kappiyaṃ ida''nti evaṃsaññī. ^b^kappiye akappiyasaññī^eb^ti kumbhīlamaṃsabiḷāramaṃsādimhi kappiye ``akappiyaṃ ida''nti evaṃsaññī. catutthaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^anāpattiyā āpattisaññī^eb^ti āpucchitvā bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovantassa, pattaṃ pacantassa, kese chindantassa, gāmaṃ pavisantassātiādīsu anāpatti, tattha ``āpatti aya''nti evaṃsaññī. ^b^āpattiyā anāpattisaññī^eb^ti tesaññeva vatthūnaṃ anāpucchākaraṇe āpatti, tattha ``anāpattī''ti evaṃsaññī. chaṭṭhepi ^a^P2.0156^ea^ vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. sattamādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^āsavā^eb^ti kilesā. ^b^na kukkuccāyitabba^eb^nti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ kukkuccāyati. ^b^kukkuccāyitabba^eb^nti tasseva paṭṭhapanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ, taṃ na kukkuccāyati. dvādasamādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
[06] bālavaggo pañcamo.
[06] dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0057^ea^ ^a^M2.0057^ea^ paṇṇāsakassa paṭhame ^b^āsā^eb^ti taṇhā. ^b^duppajahā^eb^ti duccajā dunnīharā. lābhāsāya duppajahabhāvena sattā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi saṭṭhipi vassāni ``ajja labhissāma, sve labhissāmā''ti rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanti, kasikammādīni karonti, ubhatobyūḷhaṃ saṅgāmaṃ pakkhandanti, ajapathasaṅkupathādayo paṭipajjanti, nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. jīvitāsāya duppajahattā sampatte maraṇakālepi vassasatajīviṃ attānaṃ maññanti. so kammakammanimittādīni passantopi ``dānaṃ dehi pūjaṃ, karohī''ti anukampakehi vuccamāno ``nāhaṃ marissāmi, jīvissāmi''cceva āsāya kassaci vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^pubbakārī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ upakārassa kārako. ^b^kataññūkatavedī^eb^ti tena kataṃ ñatvā pacchā kārako. tesu pubbakārī ``iṇaṃ demī''ti saññaṃ karoti, pacchā kārako ``iṇaṃ jīrāpemī''ti saññaṃ karoti.
[03] 121^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^titto ca tappetā cā^eb^ti paccekabuddho ca tathāgatasāvako ca khīṇāsavo titto nāma, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho titto ca tappetā ca.
[03] 122^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^duttappayā^eb^ti dāyakena duttappayā tappetuṃ na sukarā. ^b^nikkhipatī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0157^ea^ nidahati na paribhuñjati. ^b^vissajjetī^eb^ti paresaṃ deti.
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^na vissajjetī^eb^ti sabbaṃyeva paresaṃ na deti, attano pana yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā avasesaṃ deti.
[03] 124^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0058^ea^ ^b^subhanimitta^eb^nti iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ.
[03] 125^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M2.0058^ea^ ^b^paṭighanimitta^eb^nti aniṭṭhanimittaṃ.
[03] 126^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^parato ca ghoso^eb^ti parassa santikā assaddhammasavanaṃ.
[03] 127^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^parato ca ghoso^eb^ti parassa santikā saddhammasavanaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] āsāduppajahavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0059^ea^ paṭhame ^b^evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyyā^eb^ti saddho bhikkhu uṭṭhahitvā ``yādiso sāriputtatthero paññāya, ahampi tādiso homi. yādiso mahāmoggallānatthero iddhiyā, ahampi tādiso homī''ti evaṃ āyācanto pihento patthento yaṃ atthi, tasseva patthitattā sammā pattheyya nāma. ito uttari patthento micchā pattheyya. evarūpā hi patthanā yaṃ natthi, tassa patthitattā micchāpatthanā nāma hoti. kiṃ kāraṇā? ^b^esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṃ pamāṇa^eb^nti yathā hi suvaṇṇaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā tulentassa tulā icchitabbā, dhaññaṃ minantassa mānanti tulane tulā, minane ca mānaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti, evameva mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ esā tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputtamoggallānā. te gahetvā ``ahampi ñāṇena vā iddhiyā vā etampamāṇo homī''ti attānaṃ tuletuṃ vā pamāṇetuṃ vā sakkā, na ito aññathā.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. idaṃ ^a^P2.0158^ea^ panettha visesamattaṃ -- ^b^khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā cā^eb^ti etāsu hi khemā paññāya aggā, uppalavaṇṇā iddhiyā. tasmā ``paññāya vā ^a^M2.0059^ea^ iddhiyā vā etādisī homī''ti sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya. tathā citto gahapati paññāya aggo, hatthako rājakumāro mahiddhikatāya. tasmā ``paññāya vā iddhiyā vā ediso homī''ti sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya. khujjuttarāpi mahāpaññatāya aggā, nandamātā mahiddhikatāya. tasmā ``paññāya vā iddhiyā vā etādisī homī''ti sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^khata^eb^nti guṇānaṃ khatattā khataṃ. ^b^upahata^eb^nti guṇānaṃ upahatattā upahataṃ, chinnaguṇaṃ naṭṭhaguṇanti attho. ^b^attānaṃ pariharatī^eb^ti nigguṇaṃ attānaṃ jaggati gopāyati. ^b^sāvajjo^eb^ti sadoso. ^b^sānuvajjo^eb^ti saupavādo. ^b^pasavatī^eb^ti paṭilabhati. ^b^ananuviccā^eb^ti ajānitvā avinicchinitvā. ^b^apariyogāhetvā^eb^ti ananupavisitvā. ^b^avaṇṇārahassā^eb^ti avaṇṇayuttassa micchāpaṭipannassa titthiyassa vā titthiyasāvakassa vā. ^b^vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti ``suppaṭipanno ^a^V2.0060^ea^ esa sammāpaṭipanno''ti guṇaṃ katheti. ^b^vaṇṇārahassā^eb^ti buddhādīsu aññatarassa sammāpaṭipannassa. ^b^avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti ``duppaṭipanno esa micchāpaṭipanno''ti aguṇaṃ katheti. ^b^avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti idhekacco puggalo duppaṭipannānaṃ micchāpaṭipannānaṃ titthiyānaṃ titthiyasāvakānaṃ ``itipi duppaṭipannā itipi micchāpaṭipannā''ti avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. ^b^vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti suppaṭipannānaṃ sammāpaṭipannānaṃ buddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ ``itipi suppaṭipannā itipi sammāpaṭipannā''ti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^appasādanīye ṭhāne^eb^ti appasādakāraṇe. ^b^pasādaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0159^ea^ ^b^upadaṃsetī^eb^ti duppaṭipadāya micchāpaṭipadāya ``ayaṃ suppaṭipadā sammāpaṭipadā''ti pasādaṃ janeti. ^b^pasādanīye ṭhāne appasāda^eb^nti suppaṭipadāya sammāpaṭipadāya ``ayaṃ duppaṭipadā micchāpaṭipadā''ti appasādaṃ janetīti. sesamettha uttānameva.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattame dvīsū^eb^ti dvīsu okāsesu dvīsu kāraṇesu. ^b^micchāpaṭipajjamāno^eb^ti micchāpaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjamāno. ^b^mātari ca pitari cā^eb^ti mittavindako viya mātari, ajātasattu viya pitari. sukkapakkho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^tathāgate ca tathāgatasāvake cā^eb^ti devadatto viya tathāgate, kokāliko viya ca tathāgatasāvake. sukkapakkhe ^a^M2.0060^ea^ ānandatthero viya tathāgate, nandagopālakaseṭṭhiputto viya ca tathāgatasāvake.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^sacittavodāna^eb^nti sakacittassa vodānaṃ, aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^na ca kiñci loke upādiyatī^eb^ti loke ca rūpādīsu dhammesu kiñci ekaṃ dhammampi na gaṇhāti na parāmasati. evamettha anupādānaṃ nāma dutiyo dhammo hoti. dasamekādasamāni uttānatthānevāti.
[06] āyācanavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0061^ea^ paṭhame ^b^dānānī^eb^ti diyyanakavasena dānāni, deyyadhammassetaṃ nāmaṃ. savatthukā vā cetanā dānaṃ, sampattipariccāgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^āmisadāna^eb^nti cattāro paccayā diyyanakavasena āmisadānaṃ nāma. ^b^dhammadāna^eb^nti idhekacco amatapattipaṭipadaṃ kathetvā deti, idaṃ dhammadānaṃ nāma.
[03] 143^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P2.0160^ea^ cattāro paccayā yajanakavasena ^b^yāgo^eb^ nāma ^b^dhammopi^eb^ yajanakavasena yāgoti veditabbo.
[03] 144^b^.^eb^ tatiye āmisassa cajanaṃ ^b^āmisacāgo,^eb^ dhammassa cajanaṃ ^b^dhammacāgo^eb^. catutthe upasaggamattaṃ viseso.
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ pañcame catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ bhuñjanaṃ ^b^āmisabhogo,^eb^ dhammassa bhuñjanaṃ ^b^dhammabhogo^eb^. chaṭṭhe upasaggamattaṃ viseso.
[03] 148^b^.^eb^ sattame catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ saṃvibhajanaṃ ^b^āmisasaṃvibhāgo,^eb^ dhammassa saṃvibhajanaṃ ^b^dhammasaṃvibhāgo^eb^.
[03] 149^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame catūhi paccayehi saṅgaho ^b^āmisasaṅgaho,^eb^ dhammena saṅgaho ^b^dhammasaṅgaho^eb^.
[03] 150^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M2.0061^ea^ catūhi paccayehi anuggaṇhanaṃ ^b^āmisānuggaho,^eb^ dhammena anuggaṇhanaṃ ^b^dhammānuggaho^eb^.
[03] 151^b^.^eb^ dasame catūhi paccayehi anukampanaṃ ^b^āmisānukampā,^eb^ dhammena anukampanaṃ ^b^dhammānukampā^eb^ti.
[06] dānavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0062^ea^ paṭhame catūhi paccayehi attano ca parassa ca antarapaṭicchādanavasena santharaṇaṃ ^b^āmisasanthāro,^eb^ dhammena santharaṇaṃ ^b^dhammasanthāro^eb^. dutiye upasaggamattaṃ viseso.
[03] 154^b^.^eb^ tatiye vuttappakārassa āmisassa esanā ^b^āmisesanā,^eb^ dhammassa esanā ^b^dhammesanā^eb^. catutthe upasaggamattameva viseso.
[03] 156^b^.^eb^ pañcame matthakappattā āmisapariyesanā ^b^āmisapariyeṭṭhi,^eb^ matthakappattāva dhammapariyesanā ^b^dhammapariyeṭṭhī^eb^ti vuttā.
[03] 157^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe āmisena pūjanaṃ ^b^āmisapūjā,^eb^ dhammena pūjanaṃ ^b^dhammapūjā^eb^.
[03] 158^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P2.0161^ea^ ^b^ātitheyyānī^eb^ti āgantukadānāni. atitheyyānītipi pāṭho.
[03] 159^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame āmisaṃ ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena ^b^āmisiddhi,^eb^ dhammopi ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena ^b^dhammiddhi^eb^.
[03] 160^b^.^eb^ navame āmisena vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^āmisavuddhi,^eb^ dhammena vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^dhammavuddhi^eb^.
[03] 161^b^.^eb^ dasame ratikaraṇaṭṭhena āmisaṃ ^b^āmisaratanaṃ,^eb^ dhammo ^b^dhammaratanaṃ^eb^.
[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^V2.0063^ea^ ^a^M2.0062^ea^ āmisassa cinanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^āmisasannicayo,^eb^ dhammassa cinanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^dhammasannicayo^eb^.
[03] 163^b^.^eb^ dvādasame āmisassa vipulabhāvo ^b^āmisavepullaṃ,^eb^ dhammassa vipulabhāvo ^b^dhammavepulla^eb^nti.
[06] santhāravaggo catuttho.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0064^ea^ paṭhame ^b^samāpattikusalatā^eb^ti āhārasappāyaṃ utusappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā samāpattisamāpajjane chekatā. ^b^samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā^eb^ti yathāparicchedena gate kāle viyatto hutvā uṭṭhahanto vuṭṭhānakusalo nāma hoti, evaṃ kusalatā.
[03] 165^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ajjava^eb^nti ujubhāvo. ^b^maddava^eb^nti mudubhāvo.
[03] 166^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^khantī^eb^ti adhivāsanakhanti. ^b^soracca^eb^nti susīlyabhāvena suratabhāvo.
[03] 167^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^sākhalya^eb^nti saṇhavācāvasena sammodamānabhāvo. ^b^paṭisanthāro^eb^ti āmisena vā dhammena vā paṭisantharaṇaṃ.
[03] 168^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^avihiṃsā^eb^ti karuṇāpubbabhāgo. ^b^soceyya^eb^nti sīlavasena sucibhāvo. chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
[03] 171^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^paṭisaṅkhānabala^eb^nti paccavekkhaṇabalaṃ.
[03] 172^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P2.0162^ea^ muṭṭhassacce akampanena satiyeva ^b^satibalaṃ^eb^. uddhacce akampanena samādhiyeva ^b^samādhibalaṃ^eb^.
[03] 173^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^samatho^eb^ti cittekaggatā. ^b^vipassanā^eb^ti saṅkhārapariggāhakaññāṇaṃ.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^M2.0063^ea^ ^b^sīlavipattī^eb^ti dussīlyaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhivipattī^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhi.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^b^sīlasampadā^eb^ti paripuṇṇasīlatā. ^b^diṭṭhisampadā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhikabhāvo. tena ^a^V2.0065^ea^ kammassakatasammādiṭṭhi, jhānasammādiṭṭhi, vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi, maggasammādiṭṭhi, phalasammādiṭṭhīti sabbāpi pañcavidhā sammādiṭṭhi saṅgahitā hoti.
[03] 176^b^.^eb^ terasame ^b^sīlavisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhisampāpakaṃ sīlaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhivisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhisampāpikā catumaggasammādiṭṭhi, pañcavidhāpi vā sammādiṭṭhi.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ cuddasame ^b^diṭṭhivisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhisampāpikā sammādiṭṭhiyeva. ^b^yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna^eb^nti heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ. tañhi tassā diṭṭhiyā anurūpattā ``yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna''nti vuttaṃ.
[03] 178^b^.^eb^ pannarasame ^b^asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti aññatra arahattamaggā kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhibhāvo.
[03] 179^b^.^eb^ soḷasame ^b^muṭṭhassacca^eb^nti muṭṭhassatibhāvo. ^b^asampajañña^eb^nti aññāṇabhāvo.
[03] 180^b^.^eb^ sattarasame apilāpanalakkhaṇā ^b^sati^eb^. sammā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^sampajañña^eb^nti.
[06] samāpattivaggo pañcamo. tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ito ^a^M2.0064^ea^ ^a^V2.0066^ea^ paresu kujjhanalakkhaṇo ^b^kodho^eb^. upanandhanalakkhaṇo ^b^upanāho^eb^. sukatakaraṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo ^b^makkho^eb^. yugaggāhalakkhaṇo ^b^palāso^eb^. usūyanalakkhaṇā ^b^issā^eb^. pañcamaccherabhāvo ^a^P2.0163^ea^ ^b^macchariyaṃ^eb^. taṃ sabbampi maccharāyanalakkhaṇaṃ. katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā ^b^māyā^eb^. kerāṭikalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^sāṭheyyaṃ^eb^. alajjanākāro ^b^ahirikaṃ^eb^. upavādato abhāyanākāro ^b^anottappaṃ. akkodhā^eb^dayo tesaṃ paṭipakkhavasena veditabbā.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ ^b^sekkhassa bhikkhuno^eb^ti sattavidhassāpi sekkhassa upariupariguṇehi parihānāya saṃvattanti, puthujjanassa pana paṭhamataraṃyeva parihānāya saṃvattantīti veditabbā. ^b^aparihānāyā^eb^ti upariupariguṇehi aparihānatthāya.
[03] 187^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathābhataṃ nikkhitto^eb^ti yathā ānetvā nikkhitto, evaṃ niraye patiṭṭhito vāti veditabbo.
[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekacco^eb^ti yassete kodhādayo atthi, so ekacco nāma.
[06] kodhapeyyālaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 191-200^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāvajjā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0067^ea^ sadosā. ^b^anavajjā^eb^ti niddosā. ^b^dukkhudrayā^eb^ti dukkhavaḍḍhikā. ^b^sukhudriyā^eb^ti sukhavaḍḍhikā. ^b^sabyābajjhā^eb^ti sadukkhā. ^b^abyābajjhā^eb^ti niddukkhā. ettāvatā vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
[06] akusalapeyyālaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ^b^dveme^eb^ ^a^V2.0068^ea^ ^a^M2.0065^ea^, ^b^bhikkhave, atthavase paṭiccā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, dve atthe nissāya dve kāraṇāni sandhāya. ^b^sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta^eb^nti sikkhākoṭṭhāso ṭhapito. ^b^saṅghasuṭṭhutāyā^eb^ti saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvāya, ``suṭṭhu, bhante''ti vatvā sampaṭicchanatthāyāti attho. ^b^saṅghaphāsutāyā^eb^ti saṅghassa phāsuvihāratthāya. ^b^dummaṅkūna^eb^nti dussīlānaṃ. ^b^pesalāna^eb^nti pīyasīlānaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavāna^eb^nti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vītikkamapaccayā paṭiladdhabbānaṃ vadhabandhanādidukkhadhammasaṅkhātānaṃ āsavānaṃ. ^b^saṃvarāyā^eb^ti pidahanatthāya. ^b^samparāyikāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0164^ea^ tathārūpānaṃyeva apāyadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ samparāye uppajjanakāasavānaṃ. ^b^paṭighātāyā^eb^ti paṭisedhanatthāya. ^b^verāna^eb^nti akusalaverānampi puggalaverānampi. ^b^vajjāna^eb^nti dosānaṃ. te eva vā dukkhadhammā vajjanīyattā idha vajjāti adhippetā. ^b^bhayāna^eb^nti cittutrāsabhayānampi bhayahetūnaṃ tesaṃyeva dukkhadhammānampi. ^b^akusalāna^eb^nti akkhamaṭṭhena akusalasaṅkhātānaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ. ^b^gihīnaṃ anukampāyā^eb^ti gihīsu ujjhāyantesu paññattasikkhāpadaṃ gihīnaṃ anukampāya paññattaṃ nāma. ^b^pāpicchānaṃ pakkhupacchedāyā^eb^ti pāpicchā pakkhaṃ nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti tesaṃ pakkhupacchedanatthāya. ^b^appasannānaṃ pasādāyā^eb^ti pubbe appasannānampi paṇḍitamanussānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattisampadaṃ disvā pasāduppattiatthāya. ^b^pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāyā^eb^ti pasannānaṃ uparūparipasādabhāvāya. ^b^saddhammaṭṭhitiyā^eb^ti saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ. ^b^vinayānuggahāyā^eb^ti pañcavidhassāpi vinayassa anuggaṇhanatthāya.

[03] 202-230^b^.^eb^ ^b^pātimokkhaṃ paññatta^eb^nti bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunipātimokkhanti duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ paññattaṃ. ^b^pātimokkhuddeso^eb^ti ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ pañca, bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāroti nava pātimokkhuddesā paññattā. pātimokkhaṭṭhapana^eb^nti uposathaṭṭhapanaṃ. ^b^pavāraṇā paññattā^eb^ti cātuddasikā pannarasikāti dve pavāraṇā paññattā. ^b^pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ paññatta^eb^nti sāpattikassa bhikkhuno pavāraṇā uttiyā vattamānāya pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ paññattaṃ. tajjanīyakammādīsu ^a^M2.0066^ea^ bhikkhū vācāsattīhi vitudantānaṃ paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ^b^tajjanīyakammaṃ^eb^ (cūḷava0 1 ādayo) paññattaṃ. bālassa ^a^P2.0165^ea^ abyattassa seyyasakassa ^a^V2.0069^ea^ bhikkhuno ^b^niyassakammaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. kuladūsake assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha ^b^pabbājanīyakammaṃ^eb^ (cūḷava0 21 ādayo) paññattaṃ. gihīnaṃ akkosakassa sudhammattherassa ^b^paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ^eb^ (cūḷava0 33 ādayo) paññattaṃ. āpattiyā adassanādīsu ^b^ukkhepanīyakammaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. garukāpattiṃ āpannassa paṭicchannāya āpattiyā ^b^parivāsadānaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. parivāse antarāpattiṃ āpannassa ^b^mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. paṭicchannāyapi appaṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā ^b^mānattadānaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. ciṇṇamānattassa ^b^abbhānaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. sammā vattantassa ^b^osāraṇīyaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. asammāvattanādīsu ^b^nissāraṇīyaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ.

[03] ehibhikkhūpasampadā saraṇagamanūpasampadā ovādūpasampadā pañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā garudhammūpasampadā ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā dūtena upasampadāti aṭṭhavidhā ^b^upasampadā^eb^ paññattā. ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ navaṭṭhānikaṃ ^b^ñattikammaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. ñattidutiyakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ sattaṭṭhānikameva ^b^ñattidutiyakammaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ sattaṭṭhānikameva ^b^ñatticatutthakammaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. paṭhamapārājikādīnaṃ paṭhamapaññatti ^b^apaññatte paññattaṃ^eb^. tesaṃyeva anupaññatti ^b^paññatte anupaññattaṃ^eb^. dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā saṅghasammukhatā puggalasammukhatāti imassa catubbidhassa sammukhībhāvassa vasena ^b^sammukhāvinayo^eb^ paññatto. sativepullappattassa khīṇāsavassa acodanatthāya ^b^sativinayo^eb^ paññatto. ummattakassa ^a^P2.0166^ea^ bhikkhuno ^b^amūḷhavinayo^eb^ paññatto. appaṭiññāya cuditakassa āpattiyā ataraṇatthaṃ ^b^paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ^eb^ paññattaṃ. bahutarānaṃ dhammavādīnaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā adhikaraṇavūpasamanatthaṃ. ^b^yebhuyyasikā^eb^ paññattā. pāpussannassa puggalassa niggaṇhanatthaṃ ^b^tassapāpiyasikā^eb^ paññattā. bhaṇḍanādivasena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ katvā āpattiṃ āpannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca avasesāpattīnaṃ vūpasamanatthāya ^b^tiṇavatthārako^eb^ paññatto.
